mapper.select: select p.no as promotion_no, pd.no as product_no, pd.name as product_name, title, discount, start_date, end_date, type, p.reg_date from promotion p, product pd where p.product_no = pd.no;

insert.foreach: insert into promotion(product_no , title , discount , start_date , end_date , type, reg_date ) values(#{item.no}, #{title}, #{discount}, TO_TIMESTAMP(#{start_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), TO_TIMESTAMP(#{end_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{type}, current_timestamp );

mapper.select: select no as promotion_no, product_no ,title, discount, to_char(start_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as start_date, to_char(start_date,'HH24:MI:SS') as start_date_time, to_char(end_date ,'YYYY-MM-DD') as end_date , to_char(end_date ,'HH24:MI:SS') as end_date_time, type, reg_date from promotion where no = #{promotion_no};
